reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful. The fit receives mixed feedback from customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and good fit
items.body: This dress fit perfect and is so pretty! I am 5"5 and 170 pounds and the XL was a perfect fit. The quality is nice, too! Read more
items.author: nbanta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glitzy
items.body: Beautiful, flattering and comfy (stretchy) - super glitzy sparkly and fun. Love it. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Sparkly, but Runs a Bit Tight
items.body: This glitter mermaid gown is absolutely stunning in person — very sparkly, elegant, and perfect for formal events. The material feels good, and the silhouette is flattering once it’s on. I ordered a size L, and while it fit, it was a little tighter than expected, especially around the body. Read more
items.author: Madeeha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORGEOUS ROSE GOLD GOWN!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS! Wore to our company holiday gala; received so many compliments! Amazing fit, great (surprisingly thick) fabric, beautiful cream/rose gold sequins and perfect length. For reference: I'm 5'3 and 138 lbs., ordered size small. Read more
items.author: Valerie Vela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally worth it
items.body: This was a hail Mary dress because I bought two other ones that didn’t fit from other stores online and my event was in the next two days. I was so shocked at how much I actually really loved this dress and I got so many compliments on it. It’s not thin at all like I expected it to be, especially from an unknown maker. Would buy again. Pleasantly surprised. Read more
items.author: Sarah Geark

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What An Amazingly Sparkly NYE Dress !!
items.body: Gosh, what can I say other than WOW!! This dress truly is a head turner because it sparkles like the cosmos at night. It's a sequin dress, obviously not hand sewn, but nonetheless very beautifully done. It arrived packaged like fine china, which was perfect because the dress arrived to me unscathed. The sequins are sewn by machine onto a light netting fabric of the same color, then it's lined with a soft matte satiny fabric. It's very, very soft next to the body. The arm and neck holes have a self fabric piping around the entry points so you don't feel any hardness of the sequins on your body. It fit's me most as well as if it were custom made for me. The bottom portion of the dress is a fishtail like look. I'm 5'8" and the dress just barely touches the floor, with heels on it will be just a bit shorter so basically the perfect length for me. The details of the dress are in the changing geometric pattern of the sequin design. It's really stunning on and looking from a short distance away. It looks exactly as it is pictured here on Amazon. The price is about right for a formal dress such as this. It would be way more expensive at a department store. I've already ordered some nude colored sparkly heels to wear with it and now all I need is a crystal or sequin clutch to finish the look. This is a perfect New Year's Eve dress, and that is exactly when I plan to wear it. My husband will be so pleasantly surprised!! Read more
items.author: Flora Quinolone

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Formal evening gown
items.body: I ordered this for a formal black tie event I have coming up. This dress looks exactly as described. It’s a comfortable medium weight but I did notice even when trying it on the sequins we beginning to shed and make a mess, and that’s only having it on for 10 min. Not the best quality for the price. This fits true to size. I’m only 5’3” and 132 lbs so I ordered the small and with the exception of extra length at the hemline it fits effortlessly without feeling restrictive at all. I am having the hemline altered but you could also add some 3”-4” heels instead if you wanted. Read more
items.author: Melissa M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for the money
items.body: Ok so I'm writing this review as my wife and daughter tell me what to say so here it goes. My daughter is 5ft and weighs about 150 lbs. She typically wears a 14/16 and we got an extra large, so it definitely runs small. I would recommend going a size or two up. The dress is also a bit long for her so it would need to be hemmed. It has some stretch to it so its not rigid. The sequins is nicely done. There is an under layer dress material so it is not see through. So for the money its a very nice dress and good enough for any formal event. My daughter is very happy with it. Other then the 3 weeks to get here its a great buy. Just plan ahead if you need it soon and if you need to make alterations. Read more
items.author: Rob J

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Cocktail Bodycon Boat Neck Formal Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Cocktail Bodycon Boat Neck Formal Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Gold, Blue, Burgundy, Fuchsia, Black, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Red, Lilac, White, Emerald, Aqua Blue, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
